articles.title: Kemba’s Injury, Gordon Hayward’s Departure Could Unlock Young Celtics - The Ringer
articles.description: With Gordon Hayward gone and Kemba Walker injured, Boston’s youth movement no longer has to wait. That’s a good thing, because Jayson Tatum, Jaylen Brown, and Marcus Smart might be the best perimeter trio in the league.
